attributes.action: I want the Government to introduce legislation banning all illegal immigration
attributes.additional_details: It is unsustainable financially on the public purse as well as the Country cannot support essential services such as Health, Education, Infrastructure, Housing and everything else with uncontrolled migration currently standing at over 700 per day
attributes.background: To introduce a law to stop all illegal immigration with immediate effect with the same urgency as was afforded to the British Steel recently
